backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining data models, preview workflow types, storage mixins, access control, and mutable state for content, courses, images, reviews, inquiries, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new schema by adding default preview-enabled home page content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and requirement IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, preload, fonts, and mounting root with main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Brand logo component displaying the academy logo with optional text and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer showing brand info, quick links, and contact details sourced from queries with preview support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with navigation links, brand logo, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/HomeGallerySecti: Displays a gallery section that loads images from a query with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header, preview banner, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button that integrates with Internet Identity and manages auth state.
frontend/src/components/PreviewBanner.ts: Shows a preview-mode banner for admins with an option to exit preview.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Exports the canonical brand logo path used across the app.
frontend/src/constants/missionAssets.ts: Empty constants file reserved for mission-related assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, providing identity loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreviewMode.ts: Controls preview mode based on URL parameters and admin status with enter/exit helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains data-fetching and mutation hooks for courses, gallery images, contact info, reviews, and admin actions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom theme variables, and utility classes for a red-accent dark theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, contact info, reviews, and homepage content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and an inquiry form with support for international submissions.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays courses grouped by category with themed styling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery of uploaded images with loading skeletons and fallback samples.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: React page rendering the home screen with hero content, highlights, contact info, gallery, and a review submission form using query hooks and preview mode.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage integration and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, and loading plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing editable content features, preview workflow, existing requirements, and pending feature requests.
